import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { Title, Subtitle, Text, CoverText, Signature, Iconic } from './components/Text/Text'; import { MenuBar, MenuBarItem } from './components/MenuBar/MenuBar'; import { Image } from './components/Image/Image'; import { ImageGallery } from './components/ImageGallery/ImageGallery'; function App() { return (
<Text text="My biggest strength is that I am like a swiss army knife when it comes to UX. I have a lot of experince in developing prototypes, designing wireframes, creating studies, analysing systems, articulating text... The list goes on and on."/> </div> <ImageGallery/> </div> <div id="ux" className="Section"> <div className="Container"> <Title text="why ux?"/> <Text text="By fully understanding your users and their needs, you are able to provide them with a much more satisfying experience. But equally important, you need a mutual understanding internally in the developer team, as misunderstandings often are the reason for bad user experiences."/> </div> </div> <div id="projects" className="Section"></div> <div id="contact" className="Section"></div> <div id="footer" className="Section"></div> </div> ); } export default App;
